mapper.select: SELECT /* com.greedy.waterfall.menu.model.mapper.MenuMapper#findProjectInfo() */ A.PROJECT_NO , A.PROJECT_NAME , A.PROJECT_START_DATE , A.PROJECT_DEADLINE , A.PROJECT_PROGRESSION , A.PROJECT_PROGRESS_STATUS_CODE , C.MEMBER_NO , C.MEMBER_NAME , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_OUTPUT D WHERE D.PROJECT_NO = A.PROJECT_NO AND D.OUTPUT_STATUS = 'Y' ) AS OUTPUT_AMOUNT , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_ISSUE E WHERE E.PROJECT_NO = A.PROJECT_NO AND E.ISSUE_PROGRESS_STATUS = '대기중' AND E.ISSUE_STATUS = 'Y' ) AS WAIT_ISSUE , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_ISSUE F WHERE F.PROJECT_NO = A.PROJECT_NO AND F.ISSUE_PROGRESS_STATUS = '처리중' AND F.ISSUE_STATUS = 'Y' ) AS PROGRESS_ISSUE , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_ISSUE G WHERE G.PROJECT_NO = A.PROJECT_NO AND G.ISSUE_PROGRESS_STATUS = '완료' AND G.ISSUE_STATUS = 'Y' ) AS SOLVED_ISSUE , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_TASK H WHERE H.TASK_PROGRESS_STATUS ='진행전' AND H.PROJECT_NO = A.PROJECT_NO AND H.TASK_STATUS = 'Y' ) AS BEFORE_TASK , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_TASK I WHERE I.TASK_PROGRESS_STATUS ='진행중' AND I.PROJECT_NO = A.PROJECT_NO AND I.TASK_STATUS = 'Y' ) AS PROGRESS_TASK , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_TASK J WHERE J.TASK_PROGRESS_STATUS ='테스트중' AND J.PROJECT_NO = A.PROJECT_NO AND J.TASK_STATUS = 'Y' ) AS TEST_TASK , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_TASK K WHERE K.TASK_PROGRESS_STATUS ='진행완료' AND K.PROJECT_NO = A.PROJECT_NO AND K.TASK_STATUS = 'Y' ) AS FINISH_TASK , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_TASK L WHERE TASK_PROGRESS_STATUS ='보류' AND L.PROJECT_NO = A.PROJECT_NO AND L.TASK_STATUS = 'Y' ) AS PENDING_TASK FROM TBL_PROJECT A JOIN TBL_ROLE_ASSIGNMENT_HISTORY B ON(A.PROJECT_NO = B.PROJECT_NO) JOIN TBL_MEMBER C ON (B.MEMBER_NO = C.MEMBER_NO) WHERE B.ROLE_NO = 8 AND B.PROJECT_NO = #{ projectNo }

SELECT /* com.greedy.waterfall.menu.model.mapper.MenuMapper#findJoinProjectCount() */ COUNT(COUNT(*)) FROM TBL_ROLE_ASSIGNMENT_HISTORY A JOIN TBL_PROJECT B ON (A.PROJECT_NO = B.PROJECT_NO) JOIN TBL_MEMBER C ON (A.MEMBER_NO = C.MEMBER_NO) WHERE B.PROJECT_STATUS = 'Y' AND C.MEMBER_NO = #{ no } AND A.ROLE_NO != 8 GROUP BY A.PROJECT_NO

SELECT /* com.greedy.waterfall.menu.model.mapper.MenuMapper#findProjectCount() */ COUNT(COUNT(*)) FROM TBL_ROLE_ASSIGNMENT_HISTORY A JOIN TBL_PROJECT B ON (A.PROJECT_NO = B.PROJECT_NO) JOIN TBL_MEMBER C ON (A.MEMBER_NO = C.MEMBER_NO) WHERE B.PROJECT_STATUS = 'Y'
AND C.MEMBER_NO = #{ no } AND A.ROLE_NO = 8
GROUP BY A.PROJECT_NO

A.PROJECT_PROGRESS_STATUS_CODE , C.MEMBER_NO , C.MEMBER_NAME , D.ROLE_NAME , E.WAIT_ISSUE , F.PROGRESS_ISSUE , G.SOLVED_ISSUE , H.BEFORE_TASK , I.PROGRESS_TASK , J.TEST_TASK , K.FINISH_TASK , L.PENDING_TASK , M.OUTPUT_AMOUNT FROM TBL_PROJECT A JOIN TBL_ROLE_ASSIGNMENT_HISTORY B ON(A.PROJECT_NO = B.PROJECT_NO) JOIN TBL_MEMBER C ON (B.MEMBER_NO = C.MEMBER_NO) JOIN TBL_ROLE_CATEGORY D ON (B.ROLE_NO = D.ROLE_NO) LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(*) AS WAIT_ISSUE, ISSUE_REGISTER FROM TBL_ISSUE WHERE PROJECT_NO = #{projectNo} AND ISSUE_PROGRESS_STATUS = '대기중' AND ISSUE_STATUS = 'Y' GROUP BY ISSUE_REGISTER) E ON(E.ISSUE_REGISTER = C.MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(*) AS PROGRESS_ISSUE, ISSUE_REGISTER FROM TBL_ISSUE WHERE PROJECT_NO = #{projectNo} AND ISSUE_PROGRESS_STATUS = '처리중' AND ISSUE_STATUS = 'Y' GROUP BY ISSUE_REGISTER) F ON(F.ISSUE_REGISTER = C.MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(*) AS SOLVED_TASK, ISSUE_REGISTER FROM TBL_ISSUE WHERE PROJECT_NO = #{projectNo} AND ISSUE_PROGRESS_STATUS = '완료' AND ISSUE_STATUS = 'Y' GROUP BY ISSUE_REGISTER) G ON(G.ISSUE_REGISTER = C.MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(*) AS BEFORE_TASK, MEMBER_NO FROM TBL_TASK WHERE PROJECT_NO = #{ projectNo } AND TASK_PROGRESS_STATUS = '진행전' AND TASK_STATUS = 'Y' GROUP BY MEMBER_NO) H ON (H.MEMBER_NO = C.MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(*) AS PROGRESS_TASK, MEMBER_NO FROM TBL_TASK WHERE WHERE PROJECT_NO = #{ projectNo } AND TASK_PROGRESS_STATUS = '테스트중' AND TASK_STATUS = 'Y' GROUP BY MEMBER_NO) J ON (J.MEMBER_NO = C.MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(*) AS FINISH_TASK, MEMBER_NO FROM TBL_TASK WHERE PROJECT_NO = #{ projectNo } AND TASK_PROGRESS_STATUS = '진행완료' AND TASK_STATUS = 'Y' GROUP BY MEMBER_NO) K ON (K.MEMBER_NO = C.MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(*) AS PENDING_TASK, OUTPUT_AMOUNT, MEMBER_NO AS OUTPUT_AMOUNT FROM TBL_OUTPUT WHERE PROJECT_NO = #{ projectNo } AND OUTPUT_STATUS = 'Y' GROUP BY MEMBER_NO) M ON(M.MEMBER_NO = C.MEMBER_NO) WHERE B.ROLE_NO != 8 AND B.PROJECT_NO = #{ projectNo } AND C.MEMBER_NO = #{ memberNo }
